From: 
To: 
Subject: RE: Fedex 
Date: Fri, 16 Jul 2021 14:12:09 +0000 
Inline-Images: image001.jpg 
Thanks, =. I'll loop back in in a couple of months and let you know where things stand. 
Thanks again, and have a nice weekend. 
From 
Sent: Friday, July 16, 2021 10:11 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Fedex 
Good morning, 
Sorry for my late response. I have been out of the office all week. I can testify if need be. Let me know if you need 
anything further. 
Thank you, 
Senior 
Paralegal 
From: 
Sent: Tuesda , July 13, 2021 2:34 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: [EXTERNAL] RE: Fedex 
Federal Express Corporation 
Legal 
Department 
Memphis, TN 38125 
(t) 
Caution! This email originated outside of FedEx. Please do not open attachments or click links from an unknown 
or 
suspicious origin. 
Thanks, We'd like to identify a records custodian who could testify, in the event that it would be necessary. 
We found the attached cover letter and certification from FedEx in 2008, in case they are helpful in finding the specific 
production on your end. 
Thanks, 
EFTA00018186

From: 
Sent: Wednesday, July 7, 2021 11:07 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Fedex 
Good morning, 
Please see attached. Let me know if you need anything further. 
Thank you, 
Senior Paralegal 
From: 
Sent: Tuesda July 6, 2021 12:33 PM 
To:
C 
Cc: 
Subject: [EXTERNAL] RE: Fedex 
Federal Express Corporation 
Legal Department 
Memphis, TN 38125 
(t) 
Caution! This email originated outside of FedEx. Please do not open attachments or click links from an unknown 
or 
suspicious origin. 
Hi 
We'd like someone to sign an affidavit for now, but we'd also like to identify someone who could testify at trial if need be. 
The trial is for Ghislaine Maxwell, scheduled to start in New York in November. 
I've attached a proposed declaration, though if FedEx has its own standard format, that will likely work too. 
Thanks, 
From: 
< 
Sent: Tues ay, Ju y 6, 2021 10:49 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Fedex 
) 
Good morning, 
EFTA00018187

I have reviewed the records and they seem to be our records. Are you needing someone to sign an affidavit or appear in 
person at trial? (is this "the" Jeffrey Epstein?) 
Thank you, 
Senior 
Paralegal 
di 
Federal Express Corporation 
Legal Department 
Memphis, TN 38125 
(t) 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, July 6, 2021 9:25 AM 
To 
Cc: 
Subject: [EXTERNAL] RE: Fedex 
Caution! This email originated outside of FedEx. Please do not open attachments or click links from an unknown 
or suspicious origin. 
I hope you had a nice weekend, and thanks again for the call last week. I've attached the FedEx records for which we are 
looking for a records custodian. According to a log, the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida sent 
FedEx a  subpoena in February 2008, and the FedEx point of contact wa If we find any front matter, like an 
internal tracking number, we'll let you know. 
Thanks again for your assistance with this. Please let me know if you have any questions. 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 Saint Andrews Plaza 
New 
York, New York 10007 
From: 
Sent: Friday, July 2, 2021 11:08 AM 
EFTA00018188

To: (CTR) 
Subject: RE: Fedex 
Thanks, M! 
would you mind giving me a call when you have a chance? My number is 
Thanks, 
From: (CTR) 
Sent: Friday, July 2, 2021 11:05 AM 
To: 
Subject: Fedex 
> 
You have been extremely helpful in the past with me I was hoping you can lend assistance to the assistant United States 
attorney, I'm working with. is ccd on this email, if you want to reply and see what she can help 
with. 
Thank you in advance for al your help, 
Sent with BlackBerry Work 
(www.blackberry.com)
EFTA00018189
